name: Dr Sermed Mezher
dis: It is always nerve wracking working with a new editor but after I saw Hari’s first piece of work I knew I’d hired the right person. Hari is a great editor - works quickly and reliably while taking the initiative to make your project as high quality as it can be

name: Jeff Rauseo
dis: The video editing service has been top notch! Whether it was a video essay with lots of b-roll and clips, or a simpler talking head edit, my video quality has improved dramatically since using this service

name: sinatra roni
dis: He will be an asset on any project he is given and I hope to work with him more closely in the future. because his editings are really superb and  i highly recommand hari for video and reels editing
